title: Does your account reset every season in terms of Mutes, amount of times reported etc?
body: I didn't get a gift because I was muted last season, if Riot chooses to do this again this year do things like mutes and bans get reset so if you haven't been muted or banned this year you can get the gift? or does it count throughout your whole account lifetime?

replies.body: No what happened last season won't effect whether you get rewards next season. HOWEVER Riot doesn't forget so 1 wrong move in the new season and you will dealt with as a repeat offender.
